biocontainers.name: ssaha2
biocontainers.summary: Ssaha2 maps dna sequencing reads onto a genomic reference sequence using a combination of word hashing and dynamic programming

biotools.summary: Pairwise sequence alignment program designed for the efficient mapping of sequencing reads onto genomic reference sequences.

bioschemas.name: SSAHA2
bioschemas.summary: Pairwise sequence alignment program designed for the efficient mapping of sequencing reads onto genomic reference sequences.
